Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.listener

Interface DynamicSliderChangeListener<S>

Type Parameters:
S - The type of the slider attached to this listener.
All Known Subinterfaces:
DynamicSliderResolver<S>
public interface DynamicSliderChangeListener<S>
A callback that notifies clients when the progress level has been changed.

This includes changes that were initiated by the user through a touch gesture or arrow key/trackball as well as changes that were initiated programmatically.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onProgressChanged(S slider, float progress, boolean fromUser)
    This method will be called when the slider value has changed.
    void
    onStartTrackingTouch(S slider)
    This method will be called when the user has started a touch gesture.
    void
    onStopTrackingTouch(S slider)
    This method will be called when the user has finished a touch gesture.

  • Method Details

    • onStartTrackingTouch

      void onStartTrackingTouch(@Nullable S slider)
      This method will be called when the user has started a touch gesture.
      Parameters:
      slider - The slider in which the touch gesture began.

    • onProgressChanged

      void onProgressChanged(@Nullable S slider, float progress, boolean fromUser)
      This method will be called when the slider value has changed.
      Parameters:
      slider - The slider whose value has changed.
      progress - The current progress level.
      fromUser - true if the value change was initiated by the user.

    • onStopTrackingTouch

      void onStopTrackingTouch(@Nullable S slider)
      This method will be called when the user has finished a touch gesture.
      Parameters:
      slider - The slider in which the touch gesture finished.
